de.bzus.graph3d

Class DarstellungsRaum

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bzus.graph3d.DarstellungsRaum

  • public class DarstellungsRaum
extends java.lang.Object
    DarstellungsRaum holds points and paths in 3 dimensions. It provides several methods for handling 3D presentation parameters. Its central method is paint(Graphics2D, Dimension) as a delegate for Window.paint(java.awt.Graphics).
    Author:
    Werner Siegfried Genreith
